title: Took my laptop for repair but they replaced my software with an illegal version, can I use it? assim
transcript: sir I'd like to ask a question on software and privacy some time ago I I brought my laptop to an official surfice Center for a fixing my laptop was broken so in the end they took out a component that stored a legal version of a software that I that I own the surface Center replaced it with a new component that doesn't have set software in short I lost the Hal version of set software without me knowing in this case is it permissible for me to use a excuse me a pirated version of of the software I lost no problem inshallah because you originally had the Halal uh original version so there's no problem in that inshallah
